items.title: Linting Passed

items.title: Code Formatting Applied
items.description: formatting is consistent across all files `ddev pnpm format`

items.title: No Console Logs in Production
items.description: Remove or properly gate console.log statements for production

items.title: Successful Production Build
items.description: `pnpm run build` completes without errors or warnings

items.title: Environment Variables
items.description: All required environment variables are properly set for build and are present in the .env.example file

items.title: Lighthouse Scores (Mobile)
items.description: Performance score > 75, Accessibility > 90, Best Practices > 90, SEO > any

items.title: Meta Tags Verification
items.description: All pages have proper meta tags, titles, and Open Graph data

items.title: Image Optimization
items.description: Images use Next.js Image component with proper sizing

items.title: Sitemap Generation
items.description: Verify XML sitemap is automatically generated at `/sitemap_index.xml` and includes all important pages

items.title: Sitemap Accessibility
items.description: Check that `robots.txt` file points to the sitemap and it's properly accessible to search engines

items.title: Sensitive Data Exposure
items.description: No API keys or sensitive data exposed to client-side

items.title: Cross-Browser Testing
items.description: Test in major browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)

items.title: Mobile Responsiveness
items.description: Layout works correctly on mobile devices
